detail_desc: Long-sleeved top in sweatshirt fabric with a funnel collar with a decorative drawstring, a kangaroo pocket and ribbing at the cuffs and hem.
Boys' briefs in cotton jersey with an elasticated waist and lined crotch.

Blouse in lightweight viscose twill with a deep V-neck, dropped shoulders, extra-long, wide sleeves and wide cuffs with no buttons. Concealed zip in one side, vertical pleats front and back, a seam at the waist and a flared peplum with a rounded hem.
Short shorts in washed, stretch denim with a regular waist, front and back pockets, and sewn-in turn-ups at the hems.

Soft nursing bras in organic cotton jersey with lightly padded, opening cups with space for nursing pads. Slightly wider, adjustable shoulder straps and a fastening at the back with three pairs of hooks and eyes.
Maxi dress in soft, printed organic cotton jersey in a narrow cut at the top with narrow shoulder straps. Smocked seam at the waist and a skirt that is longer at the back. Unlined.
Fully lined bikini bottoms. Mid waist with wide elastication, overlocked edges around the legs and cutaway coverage at the back.
Flip-flops with rubber straps and fluted ethylene-vinyl acetate (EVA) soles.
Wide top in sweatshirt fabric with a stand-up collar, zip at the top, dropped shoulders, long sleeves and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.
Jumper in soft, fine-knit merino wool with a round neck, long sleeves and ribbing at the cuffs and hem.
Long, straight-cut jacket in a patterned weave with notch lapels, a concealed press-stud at the front and patch front pockets. Lined.
Shorts in sweatshirt fabric with an elasticated, drawstring waist and discreet pockets in the side seams.

Short-sleeved shirt in a linen and cotton weave with a grandad collar, classic front and yoke at the back. Flap chest pockets with a button, and a gently rounded hem. Regular Fit – a classic fit with good room for movement and a gently tapered waist to create a comfortable, tailored silhouette.
Fully lined, print-patterned bikinis. Tops with narrow shoulder straps, a frill trim at the top and decorative bows at the front. Matching bikini bottoms.
Shirt jacket in sturdy jersey made from a cotton blend with a collar, press-studs down the front and a yoke. Flap chest pockets, long sleeves and cuffs with a press-stud.
Jumper in a soft, fine cotton knit with dropped shoulders, long balloon sleeves and narrow ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.

Short, fitted dress in imitation leather with a round neckline and concealed zip at the back. Asymmetric seam at the front, short puff sleeves with narrow cuffs at the elbows, and a seam at the waist. Unlined.
Fine-knit ankle socks with elasticated tops.
T-shirt in cotton jersey with a print motif on the front.
Off-the-shoulder blouse in a cotton weave with elasticated smocking and a short frill trim at the top, 3/4-length raglan sleeves with a slit and ties at the cuffs, and a rounded hem.

Jumper in a soft, rib-knit wool blend with a V-neck front and back. Relaxed fit with dropped shoulders, long sleeves, ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem and slits in the sides. Slightly longer at the back.
Three-strand necklace of thin metal chains with bead, coin and plastic stone pendants. Adjustable length 25-28 cm.

Padded parka in woven fabric with a sheen. Lined hood with an elastic drawstring, stand-up collar and zip and wind flap with concealed press-studs down the front. Elastic drawstring at the waist and large flap patch pockets with a concealed press-stud. Gently rounded hem with slits in the sides.
Straight-cut T-shirt in soft jersey made from pima cotton containing some silk in a relaxed style with short slits in the sides.
Fabric-covered Alice band with shimmering metallic imitation leather ears.
5-pocket, low-rise trousers in washed stretch twill with a zip fly and button, and skinny legs with a zip at the hems.
Trousers in a viscose weave with an elasticated drawstring waist in a relaxed fit. Pockets in the side seams, a slightly lower crotch, and tapered legs with elasticated hems.
Herringbone-patterned scarf in soft fabric with fringes along the short sides. Size 50x190 cm.

Cargo trousers in stretch twill made from a cotton blend with an elasticated drawstring waist and fake fly. Side pockets, flap leg pockets with a hook and loop fastening and a fake flap pocket at the back. Tapered legs with shaping seams at the knees and covered elastic at the hems.
Ankle-length jeans in washed stretch denim with a regular waist, fake front pockets, real back pockets and skinny legs.

Short-sleeved shirt in a stretch cotton weave with a narrow turn-down collar, French front, yoke and darts at the back and a rounded hem. Muscle fit – a fit designed to showcase the physique. Narrow shoulders, gently tapered sleeves and an accentuated waist to create a flattering silhouette.
Jersey jumpsuit with a V-neck, short sleeves, narrow elasticated seam at the waist, side pockets and tapered legs.

Wide shirt in an airy Tencel™ lyocell weave with a collar, pearly buttons down the front and a yoke with a pleat at the back. Chest pockets with a button, low dropped shoulders, long sleeves with adjustable buttoning at the cuffs, and a rounded hem. Longer at the back.
Straight-cut T-shirt in soft, gently draping jersey made from a silk and cotton blend with a ribbed turtle neck.
Pull-on trousers in soft, washed cotton denim with elasticated ribbing and a drawstring at the waist, fake front pockets and ribbed hems. Loose Fit.

Cargo joggers in a cotton weave with an elasticated drawstring waist, side pockets, back pockets and flap leg pockets with a hook and loop fastening. Fake fly, shaping seams at the knees and ribbed hems.
T-shirt in soft, striped cotton jersey.
Vest tops in soft cotton jersey with a concealed press-stud on one shoulder.
Long-sleeved piqué top in fine-knit merino wool with a ribbed collar, button placket and ribbing at the cuffs and hem.
Hooded jacket with a zip down the front, front pockets and ribbing at the cuffs and hem.
Platform boots in imitation leather with a zip in one side, lacing at the front and a loop at the back. Decorative welt seams and chunky soles. Platform front 4 cm, heel 5 cm.
Jumper in soft, fine-knit cotton with a collar and hem detail in cotton poplin. Small opening with a button at the back of the neck, long sleeves and ribbing at the cuffs and hem.
Short shorts in soft jersey made from a cotton and modal blend with an elasticated waist and side pockets.
Baby Exclusive. Short-sleeved shirt in a soft, organic cotton double weave with a round neckline and buttons on one shoulder. Patch front pockets, and a gently rounded hem.

Single-breasted jacket in a stretch weave with narrow notch lapels. Chest pocket, flap front pockets and one inner pocket. One button at the front, decorative buttons at the cuffs and a single back vent. Lined. Skinny Fit – a slightly shorter style that shapes in at the chest and tapers sharply at the waist. This combined with narrow shoulders and sleeves creates a completely fitted silhouette.
Blouse in woven fabric with a collar, buttons down the front, gathers at the shoulders, long sleeves with buttoned cuffs, and a rounded hem. Slightly longer at the back.
Wide blouse in airy, patterned chiffon with a boat neck, 3/4-length sleeves with sewn-in turn-ups and a rounded hem. Slightly longer at the back.
Shirt in soft cotton flannel with a collar, buttons down the front and a double-layered yoke with a seam at the back. Open chest pocket, long sleeves with buttoned cuffs, and a curved hem.
Short, straight-style T-shirt dress in soft jersey made from a cotton blend with a round, slightly wider neckline. Short sleeves with sewn-in turn-ups, and short slits in the sides. Unlined.

Short-sleeved jumpsuit in stretch jersey made from a modal and cotton blend with an opening and button at the back of the neck. Elasticated waist with a decorative tie detail at the front and straight, ankle-length legs.
Calf-length skirt in a rib-knit viscose blend with a high, elasticated waist. Bell shaped at the bottom.
Sleeveless dress in a patterned weave with buttons at the back, a gathered seam at the waist and an underskirt with a mesh trim at the hem.
Cotton sun hat. Lined.
Shirt in study, checked cotton flannel with a collar, buttons down the front and flap chest pockets with a press-stud. Rounded hem.
Leggings in organic cotton sweatshirt fabric with a soft brushed inside. Skinny fit with an easy pull-on, elasticated waist.
Thong briefs in cotton jersey with a lined gusset, wide sides and string back. Low waist with a lace trim at the top.
T-shirt in viscose jersey with a motif.
Gloves in a soft, fine knit with glitter. Ribbed cuffs.
5-pocket jeans in washed stretch denim with hard-worn details, a regular waist, button fly and skinny legs.
Trainers in big hole mesh with details in imitation leather and plastic, lacing at the front and a loop at the back. Mesh linings and insoles and rubber soles.
Knee-length, off-the-shoulder dress in woven fabric with elastication and decorative embroidery at the top, short sleeves and an elasticated seam at the waist. Unlined.
Skirt in a patterned cotton weave with covered elastication and a decorative grosgrain bow at the waist, and side pockets. Lined.
Push-up bikini top with underwired, moulded, padded cups for a larger bust and fuller cleavage. Ties at the back of the neck, a decorative bow at the front and a metal fastener at the back.
Hat in braided paper straw with a grosgrain band. Mesh lining. Width of brim approx. 4 cm.
All-in-one pyjamas in soft, organic cotton jersey with long sleeves, long legs and press-stud fastenings.
Brazilian briefs in fast-drying functional fabric with a low waist, lined gusset wide sides, half-string back and laser-cut edges.
Long-sleeved blouse in woven fabric with a small frilled collar with ties and a V-neck. Raglan sleeves with smocking and a frill at the cuffs.
Baby Exclusive. T-shirt in organic cotton jersey with a soft brushed finish. Print motif on the front, concealed press-studs at the shoulders and short sleeves with sewn-in turn-ups.
Small satin shoulder bag with a narrow, detachable shoulder strap in imitation leather, magnetic fastener and a decorative bow on the flap. Two compartments. Lined. Size 4x11.5x18.5 cm.
Short-sleeved sports top in fast-drying functional fabric with a reflective print. Slightly longer and rounded at the back.
3/4-length leggings in soft stretch denim with an elasticated waist, fake front pockets, a fake fly and short slits at the hems.
Long-sleeved, cropped top in soft jersey with gathers at the sides and a sewn-in wrapover. Lined.
Long-sleeved jumper in soft, jacquard-knit cotton with a Christmas motif. Ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.

Knee-length dress in a Tencel™ lyocell weave with a unique nursing feature, V-neck and smocking on the shoulders and at the waist. The design includes a double layer at the top to help retain warmth while allowing easier nursing access.
Cap in woven fabric with reversible sequins on the front, a print motif on the underside of the peak and an adjustable plastic fastener at the back.
Cotton twill cap with an adjustable metal fastening at the back.
T-shirt in lightweight jersey with a rounded hem. Slightly longer at the back.
5-pocket washed denim jeans in a relaxed fit with a regular waist, zip fly and button and straight legs.
Trousers in washed stretch cotton twill with an adjustable elasticated waist, fake fly with a press-stud and front and back pockets.
Round-necked T-shirt in premium cotton jersey.
